name: The First Ever Bros
description:
Take control of a group of prehistoric bros. Venture into the world and try to figure out what is safe and what is not. 

It's so easy to be THE FIRST EVER when you are the first bro to walk the earth.

Will you be able to keep them safe and provide enough food?

FEATURES:

  • get eaten
  • get poisoned
  • pet a doggo
  • starve to death
  • joke around with your bros

Thats not all bro but we do not want to spoil everything!!!
